name: Eternal Time Hero
description:
Game created on the 7th Game Jam SM, by Digital Games course students, the group had 5 guys:

Rafael Padoin Alves - Game/Level Designer

Matheus Viegas - Animador/Programador

Bruno Viegas - Game Designer/Programador

Tiago Almeida - Diretor de Arte

Renato Denardin - Lead Designer/ Sound Designer
